thread.title: Miska Kuhalampi
thread.title_full: PLUS WATCH recensione scritta da Miska Kuhalampi

author: Miska Kuhalampi
title: Miska Kuhalampi
text: I bought a limited edition Breitling with trusted check-out. It was delivered to me the next day. All e-mails answered with good english and within 1 hour, even on a sunday. Product is as promised, new in wrappers with the digital warranty card. Highly recommended.
